subject: Programming
title: Profiling Before Optimizing
description: Learn Profiling Before Optimizing in one minute.

hook.text: Don't guess where the bottleneck is. Measure it. Most performance intuition is wrong.

buildup.text: Profilers show exactly where your program spends time and memory. Data replaces guessing.

discovery.text: Often 90% of time is spent in 10% of the code. Fix that 10% and the whole program flies.

twist.text: Premature optimization wastes time on code that doesn't matter. Profile first, optimize second.

climax.text: The right data structure for the hot path can transform performance. But first, find the hot path.

quiz.question: What does a profiler reveal?
options: Where the program spends the most time
